question: A cubical Gaussian surface has side of length a = 10 cm. Electric field lines are parallel to x-axis as shown. The magnitudes of electric fields through surfaces ABCD and EFGH are <katex>$6kNC^{-1}$</katex> and <katex>$9kNC^{-1}$</katex> respectively. Then the total charge enclosed by the cube is [Take <katex>$\epsilon_0 = 9 \times 10^{-12} Fm^{-1}$</katex>]
explanation: Field enters left face (ABCD) and exits right face (EFGH).
